name: Controlling Hanoi Simulation
description:
App name: Controlling Hanoi Simulation
  • Author:  Sam Edward Bùi
  • Age: 12
  • School: United Nations International School of Hanoi (UNIS)
  • Presentation link: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1kjBTpphxBdjhbZpHarTTZdcPWGyYQe6cGjCP3sQo...
Main Features:

- There are 3 sliders that can change the amount of their factor, you change it and see how things affect the sky which represent for the air quality:

  • Factory slider
  • Tree slider
  • Car slider
How to use the simulation
